channel.title: Release Pack [sprites] Plate, helm!
channel.description:
I know i shouldn't make a new topic for this but the other one was on the way down. Maby Peter could delete it if possible.
http://www.4shared.com/file/106659743/3bd520b5/Sprites.html
Updated it. Plate and Helm + some other stuff.
All are in Png and .SPR files.
You will need to compress it into sprites.rscd as i forrgot to upload it. All sprites are tested and work perfect ty to a few help.
Plate: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/351-1.png[/img]
Helm: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/312.png[/img]
Skull when you pk: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2013.png[/img]
Bottoms: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2025-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2026-2.png[/img]
When you klick on the floor: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2015.png[/img]
When you klick on a person: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2020.png[/img]
Enjo, my self i would like to see them in a pk server
Ingame picture: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/namnls-2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Release Pack [sprites] Plate, helm!
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Godandjesus, post:16, topic:279433”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=368763.msg2793580#msg2793580 date=1242932298]
http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/namnls-3.jpg

The 2nd picture. The bronze helmet.

None of them look attractive at all. In my opinion they’re beyond repair.

You should try and fix amulets/shields, ect.
Show the amulet gem while it is being wielded.
Make the kite shield actually like a kite, and not a square shield (when wielded). Ect.

You get the picture.

I wants credit if you do this.
[/quote]

I got them all already done just need packing. You can’t ask credits for something you haven’t done lol and i think Velocity was first who actualy invent that idea.[/quote]

Obviously I was joking.

Read full topic
